rooms.description: Entrance hall with foyer and built-in storage near the main door. Vastu principles ensure entrance faces north or east, promoting positive energy.

Spacious living room with large windows for natural light, designed following Chettinad style decor with intricate woodwork and vibrant colors. Vastu alignment ensures seating arrangement to enhance conversation.
Dining area integrated with the living space, featuring a traditional Chettinad design and ample natural light via side windows.
Modern kitchen with Chettinad elements, ensuring proper ventilation and lighting. The layout includes an open concept to connect with the dining area.
Two-car garage designed for easy vehicle access, integrated with driveway that respects Vastu norms by aligning along the auspicious directions.
Dedicated library space featuring built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating, designed to utilize natural light from windows positioned according to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Main entrance door placed in the north-east direction for positive energy flow per Vastu principles.
Spacious balcony attached to Bedroom 1, designed to enhance natural light and ventilation.
Spacious balcony attached to Bedroom 2, ensuring ample airflow and a view of the exterior.
Large windows installed in the living room walls for maximum natural lighting and ventilation.
